name: Chewy, Inc.
description: Chewy, Inc. is a leading online retailer of pet food and other pet-related products, dedicated to enhancing the lives of pets and their owners. Founded in 2011 by Ryan Cohen and Michael Day, Chewy was established with the mission to provide a convenient shopping experience for pet parents, offering a wide selection of products at competitive prices. The company operates a user-friendly e-commerce platform, allowing customers to easily purchase everything from pet food and treats to toys, medications, and grooming supplies. Chewy also offers an autoship subscription service, providing customers with the ability to schedule regular deliveries of their pet's favorite products. In addition to its extensive product range, Chewy is committed to exceptional customer service, with a 24/7 customer support team available to assist pet owners. Chewy has made significant investments in technology and logistics to ensure quick and efficient delivery, with multiple fulfillment centers across the United States. The company is also known for its strong community engagement, including partnerships with animal shelters and rescue organizations, promoting pet adoption and welfare. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, Chewy continues to grow its market presence and aims to become the go-to destination for all pet-related needs.

seo.meta_title: Chewy, Inc. | Pet Food and Supplies Delivered
seo.meta_description: Chewy, Inc. is your one-stop shop for pet food, supplies, and accessories. Explore our wide selection of products and enjoy convenient delivery.

faq.question: What does Chewy sell?
faq.answer: Chewy sells pet food, treats, toys, and other pet supplies through its online platform.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Chewy?
faq.answer: Sumit Singh is the CEO of Chewy, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Chewy headquartered?
faq.answer: Chewy is headquartered in Dania Beach, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What services does Chewy offer?
faq.answer: Chewy offers an autoship subscription service for regular deliveries of pet supplies, along with 24/7 customer support.
